faqData.question: How is an ERP system beneficial for automotive manufacturers?
faqData.answer: It helps automate workflows, reduce production downtime, manage complex BOMs (Bills of Materials), improve inventory control, enhance supply chain collaboration and ensure compliance with industry regulations.

faqData.question: Is this ERP system suitable for auto parts suppliers and retailers?
faqData.answer: Yes. Our ERP solution is built to support not just OEMs, but also tiered suppliers, parts manufacturers and aftermarket parts retailers. It offers modules for inventory, procurement, order management, dealer management and more

faqData.question: Can I customize the ERP according to my business needs?
faqData.answer: Yes. The ERP is modular and highly customizable, allowing you to tailor workflows, user roles, reports and features to your specific automotive operations.
